Translations.Text: Sapatha kalyanasbarupa prerita bayura
atahpara pralayankari jhatikara
sapatha pracanda sancalanakarira
atahpara suspastarupe parthakyakarira
atahpara tadera, yara manusera antare paumche deya upadesa
oyara-apatti rahitakarana o satarka karara jan'ya
Niscaya tomaderake ye pratisruti deya hayeche ta abasyambhabi
Yakhana naksatrarajira alo nirbapita kara habe
ara yakhana akasa bidirna kara habe
ara yakhana parbatamala curnabicurna kara habe
ara yakhana rasulaganake nirdharita samaye upasthita kara habe
esaba sthagita rakha hayeche kon dinera jan'ya
bicara dinera jan'ya
Ara apanake kise janabe bicara dina ki
sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya
Amara ki purbabartiderake dhbansa karini
tarapara amara parabartiderake tadera anugami karaba
Aparadhidera prati amara erupa'i kare thaki
Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya
Amara ki tomaderake tuccha pani hate srsti karini
tarapara amara ta rekhechi nirapada adhare
eka nirdista kala paryanta
atahpara amara parimapa karechi, sutaram amara kata nipuna parimapakari
sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya
Amara ki yaminake srsti karini dharanakarirupe
jibita o mrtera jan'ya
ara amara tate sthapana karechi sudrrha ucca parbatamala ebam tomaderake pana kariyechi supeya pani
Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya
Tomara yate mithyaropa karate, cala tara'i dike
Cala tina sakhabisista agunera chayara dike
ye chaya sitala naya ebam ya raksa kare na agnisikha hate
niscaya jahannama utksepana karabe brhat sphulinga attalikatulya
ta yena pitabarna utera sreni
sedina durbhoga mithyarupakaridera jan'ya
Eta emana eka dina yedina na tara katha balabe
ara na taderake anumati deya habe oyara pesa karara
Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya
